document.full_text: serbian nationalists attacked police in belgrade on sunday at a rally where about 10,000 protesters demanded president boris tadic and his government quit over the arrest of bosnian serb wartime general ratko mladic.
document.title: belgrade protest against mladic arrest turns violent
lines_and_colors: serbian nationalists attacked police in belgrade on sunday at a rally where about 10,000 protesters demanded president boris tadic and his government quit over the arrest of bosnian serb wartime general ratko mladic.
